text.paragraph_text: Glenwood Formation: Sandstone, siltstone, and/or shale.  St. Peter Formation: upper Tonti Member is a medium-grained, mature quartz sandstone;  basal Readstown Member is immature, consisting of red-brown shale, sandstone, and chert conglomerate.
